attributes.action: stop the main stream TV Channels altering schedules for sporting events
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop the main TV channels, for which we pay a licence fee, disrupting our regular viewing schedules for sporting events at late notice, which could be shown elsewhere such as on a minor channel or later over night. How many times do you settle down to watch the next episode of a drama series only to find it's cancelled/postponed because of lesser sporting fixtures, when there are plenty of minor channels or pay channels where this could be better shown.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
